attributes.action: allow personal injury compensation payouts to be payed into bank accounts and not affect benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at present if you are unable to return to work following an accident, any compensation payouts can affect your benefits.and you are expected to live of your claim.Others may receive the same settlement be able to return to work and use the money as they wish.this appears to be discriminatory and unfair.please change this situation.
